headline.main: Fitbit Tracks Your Steps; Now It Wants to Chart Your Zs, Too
headline.print_headline: Fitbit Tracks Your Steps; Now It Wants to Chart Your Zs, Too

lead_paragraph: Fitbit, whose devices encourage people to walk 10,000 steps each day, now wants to put them to sleep as well.
snippet: Fitbit, whose devices encourage people to walk 10,000 steps each day, now wants to put them to sleep as well....
